title: You Couldn’t Make This Up: Vinny Pop is Back
post: This man has discovered the alive face of Christ in a Veronica Veil which looks like the Shroud.
author: Luke Steele

title: You Couldn’t Make This Up: Vinny Pop is Back
post: Ruello deserves more respect for his work and now for the discovery of the face in the Veronica Veil. Seems like he has made the greatest discovery since the Turin Shroud
author: Peter Ford
